title.narrative: This document is for NGOs, donors, partners, private and public sector institutions working toward meeting Kenya's Vision 2030 and beyond, who are interested in understanding HRFs Kenya Development Strategy

recipient-country.narrative: HRF has been involved in the East African region for over 5 years, in various countries, working to solidify bridges that connect the region. Our effort has always been global, built on firm developmental values that we will continue to bring to the region.

title.narrative: Please find HRF's Report and Financial Statements for the year ended 31 December 2016

recipient-country.narrative: We are pleased to present our annual report together with the consolidated financial statements of the charity and its subsidiary for the year ending 31 December 2016.
